QuestData.Title: Wasn't It Obvious?
QuestData.Description: Azuregos! Yes, of course. Troubled old dragon, but lovely heart. I don't think all the years of vagabonds assaulting him have done him much good. He's a mite strange these days.$B$BNot long ago, when returning yet again to our local Spirit Healer, Anara, I couldn't help but notice that her and Azuregos seemed to be hitting it off. I imagine he's still keeping her company.$B$BThe portal behind me is probably the quickest way to reach her. It might sting a little though.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the portal behind Joanna at Xylem's tower to find Anara the Spirit Healer and--hopefully--Azuregos.
QuestData.RewardText: Azuregos! At last you've found him!
